text: Module Description *MSc in Computing graduates will need to remain up to date with new innovations in computing, which may be applicable to their chosen area of specialism. *To achieve this, students must be able to undertake research using appropriate sources in an ethical and professional manner and present their research findings in an appropriate form. *The major focus of this module will be on what research is, the different types in the studentâ€™s discipline, how to locate relevant research and then how to write correctly.
